articles.title: Hear why Kevin McCarthy gave Jan. 6 security footage to Tucker Carlson - CNN
articles.description: House Speaker Kevin McCarthy defended his controversial move to grant Fox News host Tucker Carlson access to security footage from the January 6, 2021, attack on the Capitol, telling the New York Times he "promised." CNN's Brian Todd reports.
